text: The Southern hemisphere is the half of Earth that is south of the equator. It has about 10 percent of world's population and only a small part of the world's land. A very small part of Asia, one-third of Africa, 90 percent of South America, and all of Australia and Antarctica are in this hemisphere. ==Related pages== *Northern hemisphere *Eastern Hemisphere *Western Hemisphere *Seasons *Solstice and equinox *Equator *Tropic of Cancer *Tropic of Capricorn *Arctic Circle *Antarctic Circle Category:Hemispheres
title: Southern hemisphere
